metadata.title: CVE-2018-7872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the functiongetName in libming 0.4.8 for CONSTANT16 data. The vulnerability causes asegmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
